long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Chrome extension will allow your audience to enjoy simultaneous interpretation directly from your event page. Audience members just need to select the listening language, Converso will handle everything else, especially muting the volume of the player when needed, so that the audience can listen to the preferred language whether it is spoken in the meeting or interpreted. Amazing, isn't it? Please note that you must enter an event token in order for this extension to function. Visit our website to get in touch with us if you want additional details.
